NAME: Highlights
SHORT: Notifies a user of messages outside of @mentions.
DESCRIPTION: Allows a user to configure keywords/phrases that trigger a notification to the user.  Useful for users that want to join a conversation that is on a subject they are interested, and does not require @mentions.
